turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I want to order a coffee from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, what location or city do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: In 2333 Peachtree Rd, Atlanta, GA 30305

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, What kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Cappuccino

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size and what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Size Venti and Whole milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I need four of those

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will costs 16,6 dollars in total

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, When It will be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: In 15 minutes you can go for the coffees

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, can you send it to my phone?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drinks are on order at the local store. Do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all. Thanks for your help

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks to you too

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll contact to you when I need another coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll be here for you
